extensionDescription.message: Simple and minimalistic extension for task management.

clearNote.message: The database and all settings of the extension will be deleted!

couldNotBeImported.message: The data could not be imported due to wrong format

exportNote.message: Use this code to import data (options and tasks) into another browser.

clickToDownload.message: Click to download data as file
